q: a gaming console Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer was recently interviewed by USA Today. As usual, Steve Ballmer had some interesting things to say; here are what we consider the top three questions and answers: Q: You sold 8 million Kinects over the holidays, more than you expected. What differentiates it from other gaming consoles on the market? A: Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment center. It's a place to socialize. It's a place to watch TV. parents and her husband.`` We were telling her how proud we were of her and how she was inspiring the whole nation with her courage and with her strength,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. Then Debbie Wasserman Schultz and I started joking about all the things we were going to do when she got better. We were holding her hand, and she was responding to our hand-holding, she was rubbing her hands and she was gripping our hands so we could... we knew she could hear and understand what we were saying, she moved her leg. We knew she was responding. The lawmakers continued to joke about what they were going to do together, and as they did so, Gabrielle Giffords `` started to open her eyes, literally,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. Elected officials including newly elected U.S. Barack Obama Mark Kirk will serve as hosts at the dinner, which will continue the fundraising push the Illinois Republican Party started earlier this month. Illinois Republican Party Chairman Pat Brady, We had a fantastic year in 2010 with Mark Kirk winning a seat in the United States Senate, winning five tough Congressional battles and sending two GOP Statewide office holders to Springfield. We are thrilled to have Presidential Contenders coming here to Chicago, and I am confident one of them will replace Barack Obama in 2012. As of today, confirmed Presidential contenders attending the event include: Speaker Newt Gingrich , Rick Santorum , Ambassador Rick Santorum Bolton and Congressman Mike Pence Other invited Presidential Contenders yet to confirm their attendance:
